name: SwitchPlus
0:
”Alexa, switch on the light”
”Alexa, switch on the fan”
”Alexa, turn on geyser”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill allows you to control your switch plus devices via voice.

To setup your device on Alexa. go to the Switch Plus app on your mobile devices and pair your devices with the router.
After pairing enable the skill and perform the account linking with the same number as used in the Switch Plus app.

You can then start using them using voice commands
